tossupQ:
MATH  Short Answer  What German mathematician in 1865 cut a long rectangular strip of 
paper, gave the paper a half-twist, and pasted the ends together, to show that a sheet can have only 
one side?
bonusQ:
MATH  Short Answer  In a triangle ABC, angle A = 55° and angle B = 70°.  If line segment  
AB = 3x - 2 and line segment BC = x + 10, what is the value of x?
bonusA:
6 
 
(Solution:  Isosceles, thus: AB = BC;  3x - 2 = x + 10;  x = 6)
